feed.title: ~somasis: this feed have moved
feed.subtitle: this feed has been split into two separate feeds.

entry.title: this feed has moved
entry.summary: this feed have been split into two feeds.
entry.content:
this feed has been permanently moved, split into two different feeds.

  • a notes feed in which the blog posts are now posted, and further blog posts will appear
  • a rhizome feed for a new tumblelog that has been started

in the interest of keeping it easy to pick what you want to see, these feeds will not be combined and resyndicated here.
